Class GemfireEntityPersister

java.lang.Object

      org.springframework.datastore.mapping.engine.LockableEntityPersister

All Implemented Interfaces:
EntityInterceptorAware, Persister
public class GemfireEntityPersister
extends LockableEntityPersister

A persister capable of storing objects in a Gemfire region

Since:
1.0
